mapper.select: SELECT ts.storeId,ts.storeName,ts.storePhone,ts.shopownerName, CONCAT((SELECT regionName FROM t_region WHERE regionId = ts.province), (SELECT regionName FROM t_region WHERE regionId = ts.city), (SELECT regionName FROM t_region WHERE regionId = ts.location), ts.storeAddress) as detailAddress FROM t_driver td LEFT JOIN t_store ts ON ts.location = td.location WHERE td.userId = #{currentUserId} AND ts.isdetele = 1 AND td.isdetele = 1
